name: Broccoli Chicken Roli
author: BRENKJ
summary: These savory chicken and veggie filled pastries make a great appetizer or main dish.
ingredients: ½ cup chopped green bell pepper
directions: In a large bowl, combine the chicken, broccoli, onions, bell pepper, cheese, mayonnaise, mustard, salt, pepper and garlic
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Cover a cookie sheet with aluminum foil
Place a glass upside down in the center of the cookie sheet
Roll out crescent rolls around the base of the glass, with pointy ends away from the glass; when you're finished, the arrangement will look like the sun
Spoon some of the chicken mixture onto the thick part of each crescent roll
Fold the pointy end of each roll over the top of the mixture and tuck in the middle
Arrangement of rolls will now look like a fluted tube cake
Bake in preheated oven for 25 to 30 minutes, or until rolls are golden brown
